body:
Hello Ladybug Community!
This is just to let you know that there will be a 3-hour, entry-level workshop on Ladybug through a webinar on February 27th. The workshop will aim to get new users who are unfamiliar with Grasshopper and Ladybug comfortable with the workflow such that they can follow along with our youtube tutorials later. If you are just starting out with Ladybug or know someone who has wanted to get into Ladybug, this workshop might be for them!

If interested, you can register here:
[https://attendee.gototraining.com/r/699316147682145025](https://attendee.gototraining.com/r/699316147682145025)

And here is a page describing the larger series that the event is a part of:
[http://www.performance.network/](http://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.performance.network%2F&h=yAQH-m75j&s=1)
topic: Entry-Level Ladybug Webinar Workshop on February 27th
